Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes the Alex R. Jimenez New York state military immigrant family legacy program
Summary: Establishes the Alex R. Jimenez New York state military immigrant family legacy program within the division of veterans' services.
LawCode: Add §354-f, amd §§353 & 94-b, Exec L; add §255, Mil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the Alex R. Jimenez New York state military immigrant family legacy program
